name: Just Us (itch)
description:
Just Us is an Arcade Shooter with twinstick controls, it's a spiritual successor to the classic arcade game, Asteroids. But with more oomf. This game was a 3 week collaborative effort between myself, #BlueBoxGames, with Hayden. R. and Aeisha. W. #WitchSyrup. 

https://jacobcox6.wixsite.com/blueboxproductions/portfolio
